name: One Item: Yo-Yo
description:
Use your yo-yo to push, pull and swing yourself out of this crypt.

Game made in 48h for the GMTK 2019 "Only One" Game Jam by Ralph & Sarah.

Support Ralph & Sarah!

Directions:

Jump: W or Space

Left and Right: A and D

Throw Yo-Yo: Left-Click

Hold Right-click to pass through block and let-go. 

Press R to Restart when Dead

Play with the controls to understand them!

Credits at the end of the game!
